chess

Class Hor_Ver_Diag

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Hor_Ver_Diag

  • public class Hor_Ver_Diag
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to check valid moves for Queen, Rook, Knight Methods for checking on diagonals, Vertical, and Horizontal Moves
    Since:
    2019-03-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Hunt

      • validHorizontalMove

        public boolean validHorizontalMove(int srcrank,
                                   int srcfile,
                                   int destrank,
                                   int destfile,
                                   chess.Square[][] chessboard)
        This method is used to ensure legal move for piece horizontally
        Parameters:
        srcrank - start rank of piece
        srcfile - start file of piece
        destrank - destination rank of piece
        destfile - destination file of piece
        chessboard - instance of chess board
        Returns:
        true or false depending if move is legal or not
